sentences.en: After her shoplifting spree she lived in mortal dread of being found out.
sentences.cn: 在商店连番行窃之后,她惶恐终日,害怕给人发现.

sentences.en: After three convictions for shoplifting, Martha has finally decided to go straight.
sentences.cn: 因为冒充顾客在商店行窃而3次被判罪后, 玛莎终于决定改邪归正了.

sentences.en: Fair warning: not paying a hooker is considered shoplifting.
sentences.cn: 郑重奉告: 不给妓女付钱等于入店行窃.

sentences.en: Five months ago she was acquitted on a shoplifting charge.
sentences.cn: 五个月前她被宣判未犯入店行窃罪.

sentences.en: Fred was caught shoplifting and wound up behind bars for three days.
sentences.cn: 弗列德在店里偷窃被逮,结果在牢里待了三天.
他承认了5次商店行窃的罪行。

sentences.en: He was fined for shoplifting but only received his just deserts.
sentences.cn: 他冒充顾客进商店行窃被罚款,那只不过是他应得的惩罚.

sentences.en: He's already been caught shoplifting ; that boy will come to a bad end.
sentences.cn: 那个男孩逛商店时偷窃货物被抓他将不会有好下场.

sentences.en: I felt so small when I saw my boy - friend was caught shoplifting.
sentences.cn: 当我看见我的男朋友在商店偷东西被抓获时,我感到羞愧难当.

sentences.en: If he gets caught for shoplifting, he may fare a punishment.
sentences.cn: 如果他因为盗窃被捕, 将会受到惩罚.

sentences.en: If she carries on shoplifting, she'll end up in jail.
sentences.cn: 她如果还在店铺里偷东西, 最终会被抓进监狱的.

sentences.en: Nobody is better placed to benefit from shoplifting than the shop assistants.
sentences.cn: 但是,从顾客行窃行为中获益最多的莫过于店员.

sentences.en: Nothing's what It'seems. We must make a stand together against shoplifting.
sentences.cn: 凡事并非都是看上去的那个样子. 我们必须联合起来全力对付入店行窃的行为.

sentences.en: She had been falsely accused of shoplifting in a clothing store.
sentences.cn: 她被冤枉在一家服装店里行窃。

sentences.en: The grocer accused her of shoplifting and demanded to look in her bag.
sentences.cn: 食品杂货店老板说她行窃并要求检查她的手提袋。

sentences.en: The storekeeper signed a complaint accusing them of shoplifting.
sentences.cn: 店主签署了控告书,指控他们在店里扒窃货物.

trans.tran_en: the crime of stealing things from shops, for example by hiding them in a bag or under your clothes

trans.tran_cn: 在商店偷窃( shoplift的现在分词 )
